name: Space Voyage: The Puzzle Game (DEMO)
description:
Analyze the board before you place your elements to create a path for your spaceship that will lead to a safe journey into the portal.

The portal will only open if you collect all crystals in each level. Use the coloured buttons to set a new direction for your spaceship.

---

The demo features 8 playable levels and a (not at all finished) tutorial that'll walk you through how to play the game.

Feel free to leave suggestions for features in the comments, and please mention if you discover any bugs!
